body:
Comment 1: 
On my machine, gofmt of the 2996-line file encoding/gob/encoder_test.go takes 17ms real
time and vim reformats it instantaneously if I make it non-canonical and reformat.

In other words, we cannot reproduce this. Please provide more detail or investigate
further.
_Labels changed: added **priority-someday**, removed **priority-triage**._ _Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
